title: I... actually really like the GA rework.
body:
I might be the odd one out here that thought the item gave too much defensive ability to champions like Riven and Diana while not giving all that great of benefit to ADC's or bruisers. 

Before seeing this, my honest opinion is that GA should have been reduced in cost and made for ranged-only, while making Banshee's veil melee-only. Of course, I'm the kind of person who believes Zamasu did nothing wrong and that Firefly is highly overated, so take with salt I guess. 

This rework, however, is like a billion times more logical than my solution.
